SEARCH
Package gw.cc.financials.entity

Interface TransactionLineItem

All Superinterfaces:
MayUseDeprecatedExchangeRates
public interface TransactionLineItem extends MayUseDeprecatedExchangeRates
TransactionLineItem A line item within a transaction (either reserve, recovery, or payment) for further categorization.

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from interface gw.api.financials.MayUseDeprecatedExchangeRates

    isUsingDeprecatedExchangeRates

  • Method Details

    • getAmount

      BigDecimal getAmount()
      Equivalent to TransactionAmount. Provided for backwards compatibility on SINGLE currency mode servers.

      To set this amount when appropriate, call setTransactionAmountAndUpdate(gw.api.financials.CurrencyAmount).

    • setTransactionAmountAndUpdate

      void setTransactionAmountAndUpdate(CurrencyAmount newTransactionAmount)
      Sets TransactionAmount and updates ClaimAmount, ReservingAmount, and ReportingAmount based on the new value.
      Parameters:
      newTransactionAmount - the new value for TransactionAmount

    • setTransactionAmountAndDoNotUpdateOthers

      void setTransactionAmountAndDoNotUpdateOthers(CurrencyAmount newTransactionAmount)
      Sets TransactionAmount only, to the new value. All other amounts (Reserving, Claim invalid input: '&' Reporting) are left as-is.
      Parameters:
      newTransactionAmount - the new value for TransactionAmount

    • setReservingAmountAndUpdate

      void setReservingAmountAndUpdate(CurrencyAmount newReservingAmount)
      Sets ReservingAmount and updates TransactionAmount, ClaimAmount, and ReportingAmount based on the new value.
      Parameters:
      newReservingAmount - the new value for ReservingAmount

    • setReservingAmountAndDoNotUpdateOthers

      void setReservingAmountAndDoNotUpdateOthers(CurrencyAmount newReservingAmount)
      Sets ReservingAmount only, to the new value. All other amounts (Transaction, Claim invalid input: '&' Reporting) are left as-is.
      Parameters:
      newReservingAmount - the new value for ReservingAmount

    • setClaimAmountAndUpdate

      void setClaimAmountAndUpdate(CurrencyAmount newClaimAmount)
      Sets ClaimAmount and updates TransactionAmount, ReservingAmount, and ReportingAmount based on the new value.
      Parameters:
      newClaimAmount - the new value for ClaimAmount

    • setClaimAmountAndDoNotUpdateOthers

      void setClaimAmountAndDoNotUpdateOthers(CurrencyAmount newClaimAmount)
      Sets ClaimAmount only, to the new value. All other amounts (Transaction, Reserving invalid input: '&' Reporting) are left as-is.
      Parameters:
      newClaimAmount - the new value for ClaimAmount

    • setReportingAmountAndDoNotUpdateOthers

      void setReportingAmountAndDoNotUpdateOthers(CurrencyAmount newReportingAmount)
      Sets ReportingAmount only, to the new value. All other amounts (Transaction, Reserving invalid input: '&' Claim) are left as-is.
      Parameters:
      newReportingAmount - the new value for ReportingAmount

    • getTransactionAmountReservingAmountPair

      IPairedMoney getTransactionAmountReservingAmountPair()
      Get this line item's TransactionAmount and ReservingAmount as an IPairedMoney. This is for editing in the UI only. Use TransactionAmount or ReservingAmount in Gosu.

    • getClaimCurrency

      Currency getClaimCurrency()
      Gets this line item's claim's currency. Required by the "CurrencyAmount" currencyProperty to resolve the claim currency.

    • getReservingCurrency

      Currency getReservingCurrency()
      Gets this line item's reserving currency. Required by the "CurrencyAmount" currencyProperty to resolve the reserving currency.

    • getCurrency

      Currency getCurrency()
      Gets this line item's currency. Required by the "CurrencyAmount" currencyProperty to resolve the transaction currency.

    • getAmountMatchingCurrency

      CurrencyAmount getAmountMatchingCurrency(Currency targetCurrency)
      Looks at this line item's Transaction, Reserving and Claim Amounts (in that order), and returns the first one whose Currency matches the targetCurrency. Returns null otherwise.
      Parameters:
      targetCurrency -
      Returns:

    • setAmountMatchingCurrency

      void setAmountMatchingCurrency(CurrencyAmount amountToSet)
      Looks at this line item's Transaction, Reserving and Claim Currencies (in that order) and, if any of them match the Currency of amountToSet, calls the corresponding setXXAmountAndUpdate(..) API to set the amount on the Line Item. Otherwise, i.e. if none of those Currencies matched, the amountToSet is converted to Claim Currency using the current market rate and then set as the ClaimAmount on the line item.
      Parameters:
      amountToSet -

    • setTransaction

      void setTransaction(Transaction value)
      Sets the value of the Transaction field.
